EmailTemplate.subject: Run Your Business from Your Phone
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Get real-time updates across your entire organization to transform your restaurant—right from your phone. Learn more <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/back-house-restaurant-systems/restaurant-data-analytics/pulse-restaurant-analytics-app]]> about running your restaurant—from your mobile phone.Simple, made possible. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
